content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?
Put a form to select the favourite fruit for each user
To add a form for selecting the user's favorite fruit, you need to drag and drop a form component from the "Components" tab into your canvas. After that, I'll guide you through customizing it.
just generate a form

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Header1732110725","change_description":"Add a form to select the user's favorite fruit. The form should include a drop-down menu with options such as Apple, Banana, Orange, and Grape.","acknowledgement_message":"Adding the form to the header component..."}
function.name: EditFrontendComponent

content: Adding the form to the header component...
The form to select the user's favorite fruit has been added to the header component. Would you like to do anything else?
do it with React.useState instead

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Header1732110725","change_description":"Update the form to use React.useState instead of useState.","acknowledgement_message":"Updating the form to use React.useState..."}
function.name: EditFrontendComponent

content: Updating the form to use React.useState...
The form has been updated to use `React.useState` instead of `useState`. Is there anything else you'd like to adjust or add?
generate a form to choose your favourite color

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Header1732110725","change_description":"Add a form to select the user's favorite color. The form should include a drop-down menu with options such as Red, Green, Blue, and Yellow.","acknowledgement_message":"Adding the color selection form to the header component..."}
function.name: EditFrontendComponent

content: Adding the color selection form to the header component...
The form to select the user's favorite color has been added to the header component. Would you like to make any more changes?
close the JSX element tags

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Header1732110725","change_description":"Close the self-closing JSX element tags appropriately.","acknowledgement_message":"Closing the JSX element tags..."}
function.name: EditFrontendComponent

content: Closing the JSX element tags...
The JSX element tags have been closed properly. Is there anything else you would like to update or add to your app?
when a user is selecting an item in the form, it should appear that item in the title

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Header1732110725","change_description":"Update the title to reflect the selected item in the form when a user selects an item.","acknowledgement_message":"Updating the title to display the selected item..."}
function.name: EditFrontendComponent

content: Updating the title to display the selected item...
Now the title will update to reflect the selected fruit and color as soon as the user selects an option. Is there anything else you would like to adjust or add?
Add a small image of a car in the center

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Header1732110725","image_gen_prompt":"small car","placement_instructions":"Add a small image of a car centered in the header component, below the title.","acknowledgement_message":"Adding a small image of a car to the center of the header..."}
function.name: GenerateImageAndPlaceInComponent

content: Adding a small image of a car to the center of the header...
